FactionColonies.BuildingFCDef.label: Intergalactic Market
FactionColonies.BuildingFCDef.desc: From here, ships fly in and deposit their goods and replace their cargo before returning home. +40 tithe modifier, +15% basetax.

FactionColonies.BuildingFCDef.label: Glitterworld Research Facility
FactionColonies.BuildingFCDef.desc: From this building, researchers equipped with the highest-grade tools search for the answers of the universe. +50% Modifier to research production.

FactionColonies.BuildingFCDef.label: Automated Defense Systems
FactionColonies.BuildingFCDef.desc: Androids roam the streets, keeping the colonists safe from external and internal harm. +2 military level. 400 Silver per tax period upkeep.
